attributes.text:
Combination effect “Shake”

Moves the element forwards and backwards several times.
The DOM element
Direction in which the element should be shaken.
Amount of pixel the element should be moved during the shake.
Number of seconds the effect should run.

Returns the (computed) value of the property direction.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #direction}.
(Computed) value of direction.

Returns the (computed) value of the property distance.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #distance}.
(Computed) value of distance.
Initial value for property direction.

Calls the apply method and dispatches the change event of the property direction with the default value defined by the class developer. This function can only be called from the constructor of a class.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #direction}.
the default value
Initial value for property distance.

Calls the apply method and dispatches the change event of the property distance with the default value defined by the class developer. This function can only be called from the constructor of a class.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #distance}.
the default value

Resets the user value of the property direction.

The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depeneding on the property configuration and value availability.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #direction}.

Resets the user value of the property distance.

The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depeneding on the property configuration and value availability.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #distance}.
New value for property direction.

Sets the user value of the property direction.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #direction}.
The unmodified incoming value.
New value for property distance.

Sets the user value of the property distance.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #distance}.
The unmodified incoming value.
